content.text: SNIPER: lsmap - Advanced Directory Walker & Analyzer

text: A powerful and beautiful directory walker that displays the folder structure
as a tree, similar to the 'tree' command but with advanced filtering and
[green]-f, --files-only[/]     Display files only (hides directory lines in the tree).
[green]-s, --show-hidden[/]    Show hidden files and directories (names starting with '.').
[green]-D, --depth <N>[/]       Limit the tree display to N levels of depth.
[green]-m, --min-size <size>[/]   Only show files with a minimum size (e.g., [cyan]10k, 1M, 500b[/]).
[green]-u, --disk-usage[/]     Display total disk usage for the scanned directory.
[green]-t, --top-size <N>[/]    Display a table of the top N largest files found.
[green]-r, --recent-files[/]   Display a table of the 10 most recently modified files.
[green]-e, --export <json>[/]   Export the full list of files and directories to a JSON file.
